text: Enterprises worldwide trust Amazon S3

to store vast amounts of tabular data
in their data lakes.

This data fuels analytics, machine
learning, and innovation across industries.

However, securing and managing this data
efficiently at scale

requires building complex systems
that can be costly and complicated
endeavors.
Introducing Amazon S3 Tables.
Purpose built to store tabular data.

Create secure and managed tables
in just a few steps.

Get optimized performance for analytics
and machine learning workloads.

Boost performance and optimize costs
with storage built for tabular data.

Experience
higher transactions per second and better

query throughput
compared to unmanaged tables and storage.

Store and manage tabular data
in S3 with table

level security controls
right from within the storage.

So you can define once and apply
permissions across a wide range

of query engines and applications
that access your tables in S3.

Simplify
your data lake with fully managed tables

that require minimal setup
and no additional infrastructure.

Automatic table minutes enables compaction
and snapshot management by default,
making data management easier as you grow.
Amazon S3 tables simplify data

lakes at any scale,
helping you work faster and smarter.
Get started with Amazon S3 Tables today.
